snippet: Eric Garcetti and Wendy Greuel, both Democrats, will face each other in a May runoff after neither candidate received the majority of the vote in a nonpartisan mayoral primary.
abstract: Los Angeles City Councilman Eric Garcetti and City Controller Wendy Greuel, after finishing first and second in nonpartisan mayoral primary, will face each other in May runoff; city faces $216 million budget gap and rising pension costs.
lead_paragraph: Eric Garcetti and Wendy Greuel, both Democrats, will face each other in a May runoff after neither candidate received the majority of the vote in a nonpartisan mayoral primary.

headline.seo: Los Angeles Mayor’s Race Headed to Runoff
headline.main: Runoff Set in Race for Los Angeles Mayor
headline.print_headline: Runoff Set in Race for Los Angeles Mayor
